sentence.Network_en: A pigeon emerges, wings flapping noisily, from the tower.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只鸽子从塔里钻出来，扑扑地拍打着翅膀。

sentence.Network_en: She sat by the window, noisily gulping her morning coffee.
sentence.Network_cn: 清晨，她坐在窗边，咕咚咕咚地喝着咖啡。

sentence.Network_en: At the sink, Neil noisily gargled something medicinal.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼尔在洗脸池边用某种药液咕噜咕噜地漱口。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... noise n. 声音，噪声，喧闹声 noisily ad. 喧闹地 noisy a. 喧闹的，嘈杂的.
[中考英语]词性转换规则及例子 - 豆丁网 ... noise—noisy 吵闹的— noisily 吵闹地 pride—proud 骄傲的—.
英语相关资料_启程_囧友_西祠胡同 ... children at play （玩耍的孩子） noisily （嘈杂地） in the end （最后）.
SR 21-25 flashcards | Quizlet ... noisy 很吵 noisily 大声地 noise 声音/噪音.

list.abs: The train drew noisily into the station ., 火车轰轰隆隆地进站了.
Reek ' s stomach rumbled noisily at the scents , and his mouth began to water ., 臭佬的肚子因为香味而隆隆作响 , 嘴里也开始冒出口水.
To quarrel noisily or angrily ; bicker ., 吵架大声地或愤怒地吵架 ; 斗嘴.
To talk noisily or stupidly ; jabber ., 高声说话吵吵嚷嚷或愚蠢地说 ; 唧唧喳喳地叫.

entry.tran: 喧闹的;嗓门大的;聒噪的
entry.def: A noisy person or thing makes a lot of loud or unpleasant noise.

example.tran: 我那台噪音极大的旧打字机

example.ex: His daughter was very active and noisy in the mornings.
example.tran: 他的女儿一到上午就很好动，吵吵闹闹的。

entry.def: A noisy place is full of a lot of loud or unpleasant noise.

example.ex: It's a noisy place with film clips showing constantly on one of the cafe's giant screens...
example.tran: 这个咖啡馆很嘈杂，室内的一个大屏幕上不停地播放着电影片断。

example.ex: The baggage hall was crowded and noisy...

entry.tran: (为引起注意)吵吵嚷嚷的;哗众取宠的
entry.def: If you describe someone as noisy, you are critical of them for trying to attract attention to their views by frequently and forcefully discussing them.

example.ex: It might, at last, silence the small but noisy intellectual clique.
example.tran: 它可能最终会使这个聒噪的知识分子小圈子安静下来。

example.ex: ...the noisy and unpopular fringe groups that are attempting to change the culture of their society.
example.tran: 企图变革社会文化的哗众取宠、不受欢迎的边缘群体

means.word_mean: 1. with much noise or loud and unpleasant sound;

auth_sentence.content: Driving on...2-star petrol caused the engine to 'pink' noisily.

auth_sentence.content: The little boys were noisily draining soft drinks.
auth_sentence.res_content: The little boys were noisily draining soft drinks.

auth_sentence.content: His own writing lusts for the power he so noisily depicts.
auth_sentence.res_content: His own writing lusts for the power he so noisily depicts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His own writing lusts for the power he so noisily depicts.
